name: H0ST
description:
Plot:

Year 20xx

The military’s secret super computer has been attacked by cyber terrorists, their goal is to gain access to nuclear missiles. The world is on the edge of a great tragedy. All hope lies on a special unit of one people, sent to cyberspace to hold off the virus attack, trying to fix the connective signal with the super computer by reinstalling the defenses manually.

Features:

  • Infinite single-player arena mode with 2 maps (randomly selected) + "DarkMode" for each

  • Stylish retro-graphic inspired by old arcade games and cyberpunk movies like TRON and Johnny Mnemonic

  • Nice soundrack, includes 11 retrowave'ish tracks from composer named "premiere-fetishist"
